prompt: 查询所有客户的姓名和邮箱。
sql: SELECT name, email FROM customers;

prompt: 查找所有来自上海（city = 'Shanghai'）的客户。
sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'Shanghai';

prompt: 找出金额大于 500 的订单。
sql: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE amount > 500;

prompt: 统计订单总数。
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders;

prompt: 按城市统计客户数量。
查询 2024 年创建的订单。
列出所有未支付（pending）的订单 id 和金额。
查询每个客户的订单总金额。
sql:
SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.name, SUM(o.amount) AS total_amount
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
GROUP BY c.id, c.name;

prompt: 显示每个产品的总销售数量。
sql:
SELECT p.id, p.name, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM products p
JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id
GROUP BY p.id, p.name;

prompt: 找出购买次数最多的客户（按订单数排序）。
sql:
SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(o.id) AS order_count
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY order_count DESC
LIMIT 1;

prompt: 查询订单金额最高的前 5 个订单。
sql:
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, order_date, status 
FROM orders 
ORDER BY amount DESC 
LIMIT 5;

prompt: 查询每个月的订单数量。
sql:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS order_count
FROM orders
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month;

prompt: 查找购买过价格高于 100 的产品的客户。
sql:
SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.name, c.email, c.age, c.city
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id
WHERE p.price > 100;

prompt: 查询每个客户下单的次数。
sql:
SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.name, COUNT(o.id) AS order_count
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
GROUP BY c.id, c.name;

prompt: 列出总消费金额大于 2000 的客户。
sql:
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.email, c.age, c.city
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.email, c.age, c.city
HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * p.price) > 2000;

prompt: 计算所有订单的平均金额。
sql:
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount
FROM orders;

prompt: 查询销售额最高的商品（按总金额排序）。
sql:
SELECT p.id, p.name, SUM(oi.quantity * p.price) AS total_sales
FROM products p
JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id
JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.id
WHERE o.status = 'completed'
GROUP BY p.id, p.name
ORDER BY total_sales DESC
LIMIT 1;

prompt: 显示所有订单及其对应客户的名字。
按状态统计订单数量。
列出购买过 'Laptop' 商品的所有客户。
sql:
SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.name, c.email, c.age, c.city
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id
WHERE p.name = 'Laptop';
